definition: a body of citizens entitled to elect a representative (as to a legislative or executive position)
the residents in an electoral district
examples: The senator's constituency includes a large minority population.

definition: a group or body that patronizes, supports, or offers representation
examples: creating … a grass-roots constituency for continuing the project

definition: the people involved in or served by an organization (such as a business or institution)
examples: … regards its corporate customers as its prime constituency.
